title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sketch of Horizon for Seascape", 1890–1900
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Box with horizon line, small beginnings of sky detain at left horizon, unfinished.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Sketch of Horizon for Seascape", 1890–1900.
1890–1900. Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-89-59.
